QuestData.Title: Vindicator Aldar
QuestData.Description: With your help, we were able to find a solution to our problems faster than I could have hoped.$b$bI don't have any other work for you to do. My apprentices and I can handle the rest.$b$bYou should go speak with Vindicator Aldar on the other side of the ship.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Vindicator Aldar at the Crash Site in Ammen Vale.
QuestData.RewardText: $N, is it? I've heard good things about you and the work you've been doing in the short time since you came to.$B$BWe'll definitely need your help getting things back to normal. Zhanaa, over there, could also use your help, I'm sure.
